articles.title: Apple releases patches for major iOS and macOS security vulnerabilities
articles.description: Apple has released a fix for a zero-day vulnerability that bad actors could exploit to take full control of an iPhone, an iPad or a computer running macOS Monterey. The tech giant's security advisory is pretty light on details, but it has identified CVE-2022-…

articles.title: Sony’s Xperia 1 IV Is a Nice Android Phone With an Absurd Price
